title: Killer Role
description: After filming wraps on an indie horror film, the cast and crew learn their killer star isn’t who she says she is. It’s a plot twist that reveals a real-life killer. Keith Morrison reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
